name: Carrot Dash
description:
The evil wasps have scatterd your carrots all over the field. Collect as many as you can before death inevitably claims you.

Controls

  • Move: WASD/Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Headbutt: Space (in air)

A gamejam by Bjørn, Carlos and Luca. Music is SuperBluesBrosBananaBlitz by RoccoW

PS: Our high score is 80. Can you beat it?
